content: **knitted hooded scarf in drops alpaca bouclé and drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with plaited ties ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #softshelterhood drops design pattern ab-180 yarn group c + c or e ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 58/60 cm **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-150 g colour 5110 light grey and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-75 g colour 02 light grey **needles** drops circular needle size 7 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality 2 strands on needle size 7 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
